cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on February 9, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6600, Ethiopia Stabilization, Peace, and Democracy Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 23 (Friday, February 4, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MALINOWSKI:
H.R. 6600.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the Constitution of the
United States
[Page H976]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: Ethiopia Stabilization, Peace, and Democracy Act
